import React from 'react'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { check_token_validity, get_token, linkStyle, clearCookies, disconnect } from './imports'; const MDP = () => { const [movie, setMovie] = useState([]); const { movieName } = useParams(); const [user, setUser] = useState([]); const [search, setSearch] = useState([]); const navigate = useNavigate(); const token = get_token(); const genreMapping = { 28: 'Action', 12: 'Adventure', 16: 'Animation', 35: 'Comedy', 80: 'Crime', 99: 'Documentary', 18: 'Drama', 10751: 'Family', 14: 'Fantasy', 36: 'History', 27: 'Horror', 10402: 'Music', 9648: 'Mystery', 10749: 'Romance', 878: 'Science Fiction', 10770: 'TV Movie', 53: 'Thriller', 10752: 'War', 37: 'Western', }; const fetchOptions = { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Authorization": `Bearer ${token}`, }, body: JSON.stringify({}), }; useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:8000/movie_details/?name=${movieName}`) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setMovie(data); }); fetch(`http://localhost:8000/get_user/`, fetchOptions) .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => setUser(data)); }, []); const handleImageClick = (id) => { window.location.replace(`/rating/${id}`) }; return (
{navigate('/profile');}} style={linkStyle}/>
{user['username']}
{ event.preventDefault(); window.location.replace(`/search/${search}`); }}>
setSearch(event.target.value)} />
{movie.genres != undefined && movie.genres.map((element, index) => ( ))}

{movie.release_date}

{movie.title}

{movie.overview}

{movie.vote_average}

Quelle note donnerer vous a ce film ?

REGARDER LA BANDE ANNONCE

FILMS SIMILAIRES

{movie.recommendations != undefined && movie.recommendations.slice(0, 8).map((movie) => (
handleImageClick(movie.title)}/>
))}
); }; export default MDP;
